item.title: Nvidia unveils self-driving car tech as it seeks to power more products with AI
item.description: The chip giant is looking for ways to move the AI revolution beyond software and into physical products.

item.title: Indian gang rape survivor back home after a week in hospital
item.description: The 26-year-old was taken to hospital with serious head and facial injuries and several fractures.

item.title: Nestle issues global recall of some baby formula products over toxin fears
item.description: The food giant discovered some batches of SMA infant and follow-on formula could lead to vomiting

item.title: Battle of the Sexes 'brought eyes on tennis'

item.title: Netflix pulls Chinese drama after Vietnam's outcry over disputed map
item.description: An episode in the drama Shine on Me features a map depicting contested claims in the South China Sea.
